title: SkillReBoot Program: Restart Your Career Journey
description: A program offering professional skills and a combination of professional and technical skills to help women returnees boost their careers.

title: The HerTech Academy: 100% Scholarships for Women to Excel in Their Tech Careers
description: Provides 100% scholarships for women to pursue courses in Full Stack Python, Java Programming, MySQL & PHP, Selenium, Angular, AWS, and Node.js.

title: Back to Work - Jobs Readiness Program
description: A 4-week virtual course designed specifically for women looking to restart their careers after a break, covering career clarity, readiness, and restart modules.

title: Exploring Careers in Product Management for Women Returnees
description: An informative session for women returnees interested in transitioning into product management roles, featuring industry insights and career guidance.

title: Back to Work with MS Office
description: A program focusing on enhancing MS Office skills for women returnees, aiming to boost confidence and productivity in the workplace.

title: Masterclass: Exploring Returnship Opportunities
description: A masterclass providing insights into returnship programs, offering guidance on navigating career re-entry and leveraging available opportunities.

title: Reboot 2.0 with HP: Exclusively for Women Returnees
description: A 24-week paid returnship program offering project-specific training, mentorship, and potential full-time employment for women returnees.

title: Back to Business with PwC India!
description: A 24-week paid returnship program designed to help women returnees reintegrate into the workforce through structured learning and hands-on experience.

title: Intuit Again: A Returnship Program by Intuit
description: A program offering women returnees the opportunity to re-enter the workforce through project-based work and mentorship in technology roles.

title: Women in Sales Program
description: A 3-week program designed to enhance sales skills for women professionals, covering prospect identification, pitching, and negotiation strategies.

title: Women in Recruitment Program
description: A 3-week program focusing on recruitment fundamentals, including candidate sourcing, interviewing, and onboarding processes.

title: Lift-Off Program for Women Entrepreneurs
description: An initiative supporting women entrepreneurs in tech startups, offering mentorship, business model evaluation, and access to funding opportunities.

title: The HerKey Table: Negotiation Skills for Women
description: A live workshop aimed at enhancing negotiation skills for women professionals, focusing on strategies to navigate workplace challenges.

title: The HerKey Conclave for Globally Rising Women Leaders
description: A conclave designed to enable women across the globe to rise to leadership positions, featuring workshops and keynotes by industry experts.
